document_data.mainbody:
he Scardale Provisioner was a high-quality general store located in the town of Scarsdeep within Scardale during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Originally located in Scardale Town, the shops owner, Shaliana Ghend, moved the location shortly after the second inter-dale war in 1356 DR. This allowed Shaliana to provide her goods for the country folk of the dale, though bandit attacks caused her attach a 30% markup to her prices. In 1367 DR, the shop in Scardale Town was re-opened by Shalianas daughter Talana, and it quickly became well-stocked via regular shipments from Scarsdeep.
